#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
long long P=8388608ll;
int main() {
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while (t--){
        int n;
        cin>>n;
        long long s=0,k=1;
        for (int i=1;i<=n && k<P;i++)
            s=(s+1ll*i*(i+1)*k/2)%P,k=(k*2);
        cout<<s<<endl;
    }
	return 0;
}
